resources.string:
Çağrı Orcan was born on September 4, 1998, in the Fatih district of Istanbul. 

His educational journey began at Bandırma Anadolu Öğretmen Lisesi, 

where he graduated in 2016. Fueled by a full scholarship, Çağrı then pursued a degree in Management Information Systems at Beykent University, 

graduating with a notable 3.08 GPA. 

Çağrı's proficiency in the field of technology is well-rounded, boasting medium-level knowledge in Kotlin, and a basic understanding of Java, HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. 

These skills have proven to be invaluable in his current role as an Android Developer at ebebek. His dedication was recognized during his participation in the Everest Journey Talent and Career program at ebebek, 

where he took the first place in the first year. His earlier work experience also includes a six-month stint at the ebebek store in Bandırma. 

In his leisure time, Çağrı is an avid gamer, with a particular fondness for the FIFA series. 

His prowess in gaming was demonstrated when he secured first place in a FIFA tournament at his university. 

Additionally, he is a passionate fan of Beşiktaş. 

Looking ahead, Çağrı aspires to become a Chief Technology Officer (CTO). 

His experiences have honed his dedication and focus, and with his ambition and professional abilities, 

he is poised to make significant strides towards his goal.
